cast.name: 杰姬·凡·比克 Jackie van Beek
约瑟芬妮·布拉吉尔 Josephine Blazier
杰里米·林赛·泰勒 Jeremy Lindsay Taylor

introduction: Forgotten soap-star and self-appointed Mother of the Year, Ronnie Lipsick is living the life she never asked for. An acting career derailed due to an untimely pregnancy 18 years earlier, dreams of stardom replaced with a suburban performing arts school. A husband, Cormack, who’s lust and love for life has gone as limp as his manhood. Youngest daughter, Norah, who appears to have no use for her and finally, the ungrateful eldest, Audrey, who Ronnie has given the best part of her parenting time to mould into the success she always wanted to be. But when an accident lands Audrey in a coma, Ronnie gets her second chance at the life she actually wanted by taking on her daughter's identity.源自：https://schedule.sxsw.com/2024/films/2196590
